title: Can you use HUD skins?

embed.description: https://eldinrayy.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/naslow.png https://eldinrayy.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/features1-2.png https://eldinrayy.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/seperationlinebot.png Cursor size increased to match riot cursor size, added more contrast and shadow Added glowing light beneath jungle timers Reworked scoreboard, now it should be more pleasant to the eyes :D Updated borders around options and shop to match hextech hud, and some other minor improvements New death recap interface, rito pls...

body: Are you able to use skins that alter the way YOUR HUD looks (in terms of aesthetics) or is it not allowed? I feel like Riot sees it the same as custom skins but Im not too sure. PLEASE HELP!!

replies.body:
Yes, you can.

However, as with any modification to your client these are used at **your own risk**.
